recipe.ingredients: 1 cup fresh strawberries, hulled, 1/2 cup blueberries, 1/2 medium banana, sliced, 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk, 1/2 cup ice cubes, 1 tablespoon chia seeds, optional, 1 tablespoon flaxseed meal, optional, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, Sugar substitute equivalent to 1 tablespoon sugar, optional
recipe.directions: Place strawberries, blueberries, banana, almond milk, ice cubes, chia seeds and flaxseed meal, if using, lemon juice, vanilla extract, and sugar substitute, if desired, into a blender. Blend on high speed until smooth, about 1 minute or until desired consistency is reached. If the smoothie is too thick, you can add more almond milk to thin it out. Once done, pour the smoothie into glasses and serve immediately.
